name: Empress of the Seas
description: One of the most recognised names in the industry,The Cruise rose to stardom with the concept of cruising holidays. Beginning with a single cruise in 1965, It now boasts an impressive fleet of ships. Sailing on this is like sailing on your own private yacht. These are intimate ships with less than 300 suites onboard.
